verses.verse: In the five <S%H2568><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of our captivity, <S%H1546><s%> in the beginning <S%H7218><s%> of the year, <S%H8141><s%> in the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> in the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> was smitten, <S%H5221><s%> in the selfsame <S%H2088><s%> <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> me, and brought <S%H935><s%> me thither. <S%H8033><s%>

In the visions <S%H4759><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> he me into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and set <S%H5117><s%> me upon <S%H413><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> high <S%H1364><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> which was as the frame <S%H4011><s%> of a city <S%H5892><s%> on the south. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5045><s%>

And he brought <S%H935><s%> me thither, <S%H8033><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there was a man, <S%H376><s%> whose appearance <S%H4758><s%> was like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> with a line <S%H6616><s%> of flax <S%H6593><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and a measuring <S%H4060><s%> reed; <S%H7070><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> in the gate. <S%H8179><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> behold <S%H7200><s%> with thine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> with thine ears, <S%H241><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> thine heart <S%H3820><s%> upon all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> shall show <S%H7200><s%> thee; for <S%H3588><s%> to the intent that <S%H4616><s%> I might show <S%H7200><s%> them unto thee art thou brought <S%H935><s%> hither: <S%H2008><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> seest <S%H7200><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And behold <S%H2009><s%> a wall <S%H2346><s%> on the outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> and in the man's <S%H376><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> a measuring <S%H4060><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> of six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long by the cubit <S%H520><s%> and a handbreadth: <S%H2948><s%> so he measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H853><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the building, <S%H1146><s%> one <S%H259><s%> reed; <S%H7070><s%> and the height, <S%H6967><s%> one <S%H259><s%> reed. <S%H7070><s%>

Then came <S%H935><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> which <S%H834><s%> looketh <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the east, <S%H6921><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> the stairs <S%H4609><s%> thereof, and measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H853><s%> the threshold <S%H5592><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> which was one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> broad; <S%H7341><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> threshold <S%H5592><s%> of the gate, which was one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> broad. <S%H7341><s%>

And every little chamber <S%H8372><s%> was one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> long, <S%H753><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> broad; <S%H7341><s%> and between <S%H996><s%> the little chambers <S%H8372><s%> were five <S%H2568><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and the threshold <S%H5592><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> by <S%H4480><s%> <S%H681><s%> the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> within <S%H1004><s%> was one <S%H259><s%> reed. <S%H7070><s%>
He measured <S%H4058><s%> also <S%H853><s%> the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> within, <S%H1004><s%> one <S%H259><s%> reed. <S%H7070><s%>

Then measured <S%H4058><s%> he <S%H853><s%> the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof, two <S%H8147><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> was inward. <S%H1004><s%>

And the little chambers <S%H8372><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> eastward <S%H1870><s%> <S%H6921><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> on this side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> on that side; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> they three <S%H7969><s%> were of one <S%H259><s%> measure: <S%H4060><s%> and the posts <S%H352><s%> had one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%> on this side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and on that side. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%>

And he measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H853><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the entry <S%H6607><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and the length <S%H753><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

The space <S%H1366><s%> also before <S%H6440><s%> the little chambers <S%H8372><s%> was one <S%H259><s%> cubit <S%H520><s%> on this side, and the space <S%H1366><s%> was one <S%H259><s%> cubit <S%H520><s%> on that side: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and the little chambers <S%H8372><s%> were six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> on this side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> on that side. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%>

He measured <S%H4058><s%> then <S%H853><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> from the roof <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1406><s%> of one little chamber <S%H8372><s%> to the roof <S%H1406><s%> of another: the breadth <S%H7341><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> door <S%H6607><s%> against <S%H5048><s%> door. <S%H6607><s%>

He made <S%H6213><s%> also <S%H853><s%> posts <S%H352><s%> of threescore <S%H8346><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> even unto <S%H413><s%> the post <S%H352><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> the gate. <S%H8179><s%>

And from <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the entrance <S%H2978><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> were fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

And there were narrow <S%H331><s%> windows <S%H2474><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the little chambers, <S%H8372><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> their posts <S%H352><s%> within <S%H6441><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> and likewise <S%H3651><s%> to the porches: <S%H361><s%> and windows <S%H2474><s%> were round about <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> inward: <S%H6441><s%> and upon <S%H413><s%> each post <S%H352><s%> were palm trees. <S%H8561><s%>

Then brought <S%H935><s%> he me into <S%H413><s%> the outward <S%H2435><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> there were chambers, <S%H3957><s%> and a pavement <S%H7531><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> for the court <S%H2691><s%> round about: <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%> were upon <S%H413><s%> the pavement. <S%H7531><s%>

And the pavement <S%H7531><s%> by <S%H413><s%> the side <S%H3802><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%> was the lower <S%H8481><s%> pavement. <S%H7531><s%>

Then he measured <S%H4058><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> from the forefront <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the lower <S%H8481><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> unto the forefront <S%H6440><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> without, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> eastward <S%H6921><s%> and northward. <S%H6828><s%>

And the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the outward <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> that <S%H834><s%> looked <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the north, <S%H6828><s%> he measured <S%H4058><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof.

And the little chambers <S%H8372><s%> thereof were three <S%H7969><s%> on this side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> on that side; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof and the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof were <S%H1961><s%> after the measure <S%H4060><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> gate: <S%H8179><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> thereof was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

And their windows, <S%H2474><s%> and their porches, <S%H361><s%> and their palm trees, <S%H8561><s%> were after the measure <S%H4060><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> that <S%H834><s%> looketh <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the east; <S%H6921><s%> and they went up <S%H5927><s%> unto it by seven <S%H7651><s%> steps; <S%H4609><s%> and the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof were before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> was over against <S%H5048><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> toward the north, <S%H6828><s%> and toward the east; <S%H6921><s%> and he measured <S%H4058><s%> from gate <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8179><s%> to <S%H413><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

After that he brought <S%H1980><s%> me toward <S%H1870><s%> the south, <S%H1864><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> a gate <S%H8179><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the south: <S%H1864><s%> and he measured <S%H4058><s%> the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof and the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof according to these <S%H428><s%> measures. <S%H4060><s%>

And there were windows <S%H2474><s%> in it and in the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof round about, <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> like those <S%H428><s%> windows: <S%H2474><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

And there were seven <S%H7651><s%> steps <S%H4609><s%> to go up <S%H5930><s%> to it, and the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof were before <S%H6440><s%> them: and it had palm trees, <S%H8561><s%> one <S%H259><s%> on this side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> on that side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof.

And there was a gate <S%H8179><s%> in the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the south: <S%H1864><s%> and he measured <S%H4058><s%> from gate <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8179><s%> to <S%H413><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

And he brought <S%H935><s%> me to <S%H413><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> by the south <S%H1864><s%> gate: <S%H8179><s%> and he measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H853><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> according to these <S%H428><s%> measures; <S%H4060><s%>

And the little chambers <S%H8372><s%> thereof, and the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof, and the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof, according to these <S%H428><s%> measures: <S%H4060><s%> and there were windows <S%H2474><s%> in it and in the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof round about: <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> it was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long, <S%H753><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad. <S%H7341><s%>

And the porches <S%H361><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> were five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long, <S%H753><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad. <S%H7341><s%>

And the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof were toward <S%H413><s%> the utter <S%H2435><s%> court; <S%H2691><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%> were upon <S%H413><s%> the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof: and the going up <S%H4608><s%> to it had eight <S%H8083><s%> steps. <S%H4609><s%>

And he brought <S%H935><s%> me into <S%H413><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the east: <S%H6921><s%> and he measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H853><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> according to these <S%H428><s%> measures. <S%H4060><s%>

And the little chambers <S%H8372><s%> thereof, and the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof, and the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof, were according to these <S%H428><s%> measures: <S%H4060><s%> and there were windows <S%H2474><s%> therein and in the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof round about: <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> it was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long, <S%H753><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad. <S%H7341><s%>

And the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof were toward the outward <S%H2435><s%> court; <S%H2691><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%> were upon <S%H413><s%> the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof, on this side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and on that side: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and the going up <S%H4608><s%> to it had eight <S%H8083><s%> steps. <S%H4609><s%>
And he brought <S%H935><s%> me to <S%H413><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> and measured <S%H4058><s%> it according to these <S%H428><s%> measures; <S%H4060><s%>

The little chambers <S%H8372><s%> thereof, the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof, and the porches <S%H361><s%> thereof, and the windows <S%H2474><s%> to it round about: <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

And the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof were toward the utter <S%H2435><s%> court; <S%H2691><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%> were upon <S%H413><s%> the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof, on this side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and on that side: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and the going up <S%H4608><s%> to it had eight <S%H8083><s%> steps. <S%H4609><s%>

And the chambers <S%H3957><s%> and the entries <S%H6607><s%> thereof were by the posts <S%H352><s%> of the gates, <S%H8179><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> they washed <S%H1740><s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%>

And in the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> were two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%> on this side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%> on that side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> to slay <S%H7819><s%> thereon <S%H413><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> and the trespass offering. <S%H817><s%>

And at <S%H413><s%> the side <S%H3802><s%> without, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> as one goeth up <S%H5927><s%> to the entry <S%H6607><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> were two <S%H8147><s%> tables; <S%H7979><s%> and on <S%H413><s%> the other <S%H312><s%> side, <S%H3802><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was at the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> were two <S%H8147><s%> tables. <S%H7979><s%>

Four <S%H702><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%> were on this side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%> on that side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6311><s%> by the side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate; <S%H8179><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> tables, <S%H7979><s%> whereupon <S%H413><s%> they slew <S%H7819><s%> their sacrifices.

And the four <S%H702><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%> were of hewn <S%H1496><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> for the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> of a <S%H259><s%> cubit <S%H520><s%> and a <S%H259><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> long, <S%H753><s%> and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> broad, <S%H7341><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> cubit <S%H520><s%> high: <S%H1363><s%> whereupon <S%H413><s%> also they laid <S%H5117><s%> <S%H853><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> they slew <S%H7819><s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and the sacrifice. <S%H2077><s%>

And within <S%H1004><s%> were hooks, <S%H8240><s%> a <S%H259><s%> hand broad, <S%H2948><s%> fastened <S%H3559><s%> round about: <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> and upon <S%H413><s%> the tables <S%H7979><s%> was the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the offering. <S%H7133><s%>

And without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> were the chambers <S%H3957><s%> of the singers <S%H7891><s%> in the inner <S%H6442><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was at <S%H413><s%> the side <S%H3802><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate; <S%H8179><s%> and their prospect <S%H6440><s%> was toward <S%H1870><s%> the south: <S%H1864><s%> one <S%H259><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the side <S%H3802><s%> of the east <S%H6921><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> having the prospect <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the north. <S%H6828><s%>
